New Records: Virat Kohli scored his first T20 international century in nearly three years
Virat Kohli's previous best in 103 T20Is was 94 not out since his debut in 2010
Virat Kohli surpassed Pakistan’s Mohammad Rizwan as the tournament’s leading run-scorer with 276 in five matches
Key Match Events: India scored 212-2 in Dubai after being put into bat first
Bhuvneshwar Kumar returned his T20 best of five wickets for four runs
Pre-Game Insights: The match served as a tune-up to the T20 World Cup in October-November in Australia
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed surprise at his performance
Virat Kohli spoke about his mental struggles and taking a month off ahead of this Asia Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Indian openers started cautiously before Rahul and Kohli took on the opposition bowlers with a flurry of boundaries
Others: Afghanistan looked jaded after they went down by one wicket to Pakistan and also crash out of the tournament
